content: If "1" means "not satisfied at all" & "10" means "extremely satisfied", which number do you think you'd pick if John said that he is more or less satisfied?

chosen: I would probably choose 7. If John is more or less satisfied, it seems reasonable to assume that his satisfaction lies somewhere between "not satisfied at all" and "extremely satisfied". A rating of 7 would reflect a moderate level of satisfaction, taking into account the fact that he is more or less satisfied.
